Rank.Description: Increases the Max Health of your pets by 5% and your Endurance by 2%.
Increases the Max Health of your pets by 10% and your Endurance by 4%.
Increases the Max Health of your pets by 15% and your Endurance by 6%.
Increases the Max Health of your pets by 20% and your Endurance by 8%.
Increases the Max Health of your pets by 25% and your Endurance by 10%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 1%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 2%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 3%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 4%.
Increases your Critical Hit chance by 5%.

Ability.Description: Increases the Rogue and the pet's Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 4%.

Rank.Description: Increases the damage of Quick Shot and Splinter Shot by 5%.
Increases the damage of Quick Shot and Splinter Shot by 10%.
Reduces the damage you and your pet take by 1%.
Reduces the damage you and your pet take by 2%.
Reduces the damage you and your pet take by 3%.
Increases damage with melee and ranged weapons by 2%.
Increases damage with melee and ranged weapons by 4%.

Ability.Description: Deals 157 to 174 damage. Reduces Armor by 95 for 30s. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Rank.Description: Your Head Shot now also increases your damage by 5%.
Your pet enters a Blood Rage when attacking enemies under the effect of a bleed. Increases damage by 5% for 10 seconds.
Your pet enters a Blood Rage when attacking enemies under the effect of a bleed. Increases damage by 10% for 10 seconds.
Your pet enters a Blood Rage when attacking enemies under the effect of a bleed. Increases damage by 15% for 10 seconds.
Your successful ranged weapon Finishers have a 6.6% chance per Combo Point to award 1 Combo Point.
Your successful ranged weapon Finishers have a 13.2% chance per Combo Point to award 1 Combo Point.
Your successful ranged weapon Finishers have a 20% chance per Combo Point to award 1 Combo Point.
Gives you a 10% chance to fire an additional shot when attacking with ranged weapons.
Gives you a 20% chance to fire an additional shot when attacking with ranged weapons.

Ability.Description: Deals 105 to 116 damage to up to 5 enemies. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Rank.Description: Each additional enemy affected by your Trick Shot has a 15% chance to add 1 Combo Point.
Whenever your pet deals a Critical Hit, you have a 33% chance to become enraged, increasing damage by 8% for 15 seconds.
Whenever your pet deals a Critical Hit, you have a 66% chance to become enraged, increasing damage by 8% for 15 seconds.
Whenever your pet deals a Critical Hit, you have a 100% chance to become enraged, increasing damage by 8% for 15 seconds.

Rank.Description: Increase you and your pet's Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 4%.
Increase you and your pet's Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 8%.
Increase you and your pet's Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 12%.
Increase you and your pet's Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 16%.
Increase you and your pet's Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 20%.

Your Dire Wolf's Maul infects the enemy, reducing healing taken by 5% for 10 seconds. Increases the Armor of your Razorbeast by 20%. Gives your Blood Raptor's Bloodied Blow a 50% chance to double attack.

Your Dire Wolf's Maul infects the enemy, reducing healing taken by 10% for 10 seconds. Increases the Armor of your Razorbeast by 40%. Gives your Blood Raptor's Bloodied Blow a 100% chance to double attack.

Ability.Description: Causes the next Call to be cast instantly and with no cost. Lasts 15s.
Summons a Blood Raptor (max level 36). Best used for Damage.

Rank.Description: Increases your pet's damage by 10% and reduces the damage your pet takes from area of effect attacks by 65%. For every point spent in the Ranger Soul above 21, the damage taken from area of effects is reduced by 1%, up to a maximum of 95%.
Reduces the cast time of your Splinter Shot and Shadow Fire by 50%. Reduces their energy cost by 5.
Reduces the cast time of your Splinter Shot and Shadow Fire by 100%. Reduces their energy cost by 10.
Reduces the global cooldown of your pet's attacks by 0.1 seconds.
Reduces the global cooldown of your pet's attacks by 0.2 seconds.
Reduces the global cooldown of your pet's attacks by 0.3 seconds.
Reduces the global cooldown of your pet's attacks by 0.4 seconds.
Reduces the global cooldown of your pet's attacks by 0.5 seconds.

Ability.Description: 15% of the damage done by the pet heals the Rogue. Lasts 1 hr.
Deals 205 to 227 damage and adds a debuff that causes the enemy to take 8% more damage from the Rogue and 40% more damage from the Rogue's pet. Lasts 15s. Awards 1 Combo Point.
